item.title: 5 Git Tips and Tricks You Should Know
item.description: Whether you’re a Git beginner or a seasoned contributor, there are always some neat tricks to make your workflow smoother. Here are 5 Git tips I use constantly: 1. Amend the Last Commit Made a small mistake in your last commit message or forgot to add a file? git commit --amend
